name: Bejeweled 2 Deluxe
description:
Bejeweled 2 Deluxe is a casual game developed by PopCap Games. It came out on 30-08-2006. It was published by PopCap Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Bejeweled 2 Deluxe on PC and macOS. You can purchase the game on Steam.
Peter Hajba scored the game.
